amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit OPIC funding for manufacturing enterprises in foreign countries, if such investments would cause a reduction in manufacturing in the United States.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Manzullo to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 379 - 49 (Roll no. 495).
